name: Mustafa Alramamneh
title: Senior Project Engineer specializing in QA testing and problem management for BMW. Holds a Master’s in Mechatronics and possesses expertise in Python, C++, and automated workflows
summary: Motivated Industrial Engineer with a strong focus on Data Analytics, Automation, and Process Management. Experienced in building end-to-end data solutions, automating complex workflows, and developing KPI-driven dashboards in industrial environments. Passionate about creating scalable, data-driven systems that improve efficiency and support sustainable technical progress.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering

experience.description: Design, maintenance, and automation of data pipelines for digitalization initiatives in the eBike domain.
achievements: Development of Python scripts for automated data ingestion, cleaning, validation, and transformation.
Creation and optimization of SQL queries and database structures for efficient data processing.
Development of KPI dashboards and automated reports for performance monitoring.

experience.role: Bachelor Thesis – Automated Visualization of eBike System Data
experience.description: End-to-end prototype for automated visualization of MF4 telemetry data.
achievements: Design and implementation of scalable database schemas for large telemetry files.
Development of data validation and cleansing pipelines.
Integration of proof-of-concept into existing Bosch workflows.

experience.description: Support of development projects through data-based analysis and reporting.
achievements: System data analysis using Excel, Python, and internal Bosch tools.
Execution and tracking of ECU software updates using Monaco.
Creation of structured reports, process documentation, and project KPIs.

experience.role: Working Student – Goods Receiving & Process Data Management
experience.description: Recording and processing of incoming goods data in ERP systems.
achievements: Analysis of process data to identify optimization potential.
Ensuring data quality and traceability in pharmaceutical logistics.

experience.description: Modeling and analysis of logistical and operational processes.
achievements: Support in KPI definition and process data evaluation.
Creation of visual process models and technical documentation.

experience.description: Operational and administrative process support and market analysis.
achievements: Market and data analysis for sales and marketing.
Contribution to digitalization initiatives and basic front-end development.
